#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<cmath>
#define intin(a)    scanf("%d",&a)
#define scans(a)    scanf("%s",a)
#define LL long long
#define MAX(a,b) a>b?a:b
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    //freopen("rubix.txt","r",stdin);
    int cases,n,a[51],flag[51];
    int i,j,cnt,mx;
    intin(cases);
    while(cases--)
    {
        intin(n);mx=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            {intin(a[i]);flag[i]=0;}

        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {   if(flag[i]==0)
            {   cnt=1;
                for(j=i+1;j<n;j++)
                {   if(a[j]==a[i]+j-i)
                    {   flag[j]=1;
                        cnt++;}
                }
                mx=MAX(mx,cnt);
            }
        }
        cout<<n-mx<<"\n";
    }
}
